## Welcome to the Logistics Repository

This is a space in the Rich Molecular Health Lab's github site where we can store and share logistical items like schedules, progress reports, etc.

## Graduate Students

If you are a new graduate student in the Biology MS program, then you should check out the [tentative schedule linked here.](https://rich-molecular-health-lab.github.io/logistics/grad_plan.html)
